author: jwoolley
msg: We not only want to avoid displaying it, we want to avoid sending it
to the client entirely.  We need a mod_include conditional for that.

author: rbb
msg: We must set the MIME-type for .shtml files to text/html if we want them
to be parsed for SSI tags.  Add the config for that to the default
config file so that it is easier to enable .shtml parsing.

author: rbb
msg: Comment out the SERVER_STRING variable from our default error documents.

it makes sense to not do it by default.  If users want this back, they

msg: Fixed a problem with 'make install' on one of the tarballs (which

msg: Make the default_handler catch all requests that aren't served by
